body.name: Voweek Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, 6 in 1 Lightweight Stick Vacuum with 3 Power Modes, LED Display, Powerful Vacuum Cleaner Up to 45min Runtime for Hardwood Floor Pet Hair Home Car
features: 🏠【Powerful Suction Modes】The cordless vacuum cleaner features 3 strong suction modes (Min, Mid & Max) to effectively tackle various types of dirt and debris, from pet hair to food crumbs. With its advanced cyclone technology, this vacuum cleaner provides powerful cleaning performance on hardwood floors, carpets, and tiles.

🏠【LED Display for Easy Monitoring】Equipped with a large LED display, our stick vacuum allows you to monitor its current performance at a glance. You can easily check the battery life, cleaning mode, and receive alerts for floor brush jams. Stay informed and in control while achieving a spotless home.

🏠【High-Efficiency Filtration System】The vacuum cleaner is equipped with a 5-layer high-efficiency filtration system. Combined with a double HEPA filter and sealed technology, the cordless stick vacuum captures fine particles as small as 0.1um with up to 99.99% efficiency. Enjoy a healthier living environment.

🏠【Detachable Battery for Extended Runtime】Say goodbye to interruptions during cleaning sessions. Our hardwood floor vacuum features a detachable and rechargeable battery with a long-lasting runtime of up to 45 minutes in standard suction mode. Clean your entire home without worrying about running out of power.

🏠【Versatile 6-in-1 Design】The vacuum cordless is more than just a stick vacuum. It comes with a 2-in-1 stiff & soft roller brush, additional functional brushes, and an extensible stick. Effortlessly clean every corner of your home, from stairs and windowsills to sofas and floors. Enjoy the convenience and versatility of this lightweight cleaning tool.

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: 6-in-1 handheld cordless stick vacuum great for hard floor & low pile carpet, 3 modes powerful suction with 150W high-performance cyclonic motor, Lightweight body with 180° rotatable LED brush head for flexible maneuverability, 5-Stage Fully-Sealed Filtration See more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite vacuum!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had this vacuum for 5 months now and it’s awesome! Very versatile and light-weight. I use it all over the house. If you use the max suction, the battery life is pretty short, but I haven’t found that I really need to use it on max much. Usually will use it on max on my living room rug. Otherwise, I usually just stick to the minimum suction and I can get a decent amount of uses between charges. The typical square footage I use it for is probably about 1200. Maneuverability is amazing! I can easily get around furniture, corners, and high to reach places when I use it for dusting.As for storage, I usually keep it broken down just to make it quick and easy to grab the specific attachments I need for whatever I need it for. It hardly takes up any space at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars the best vaccume
reviews.reviewText: This is the best vaccume i ever had me and my grandson love vaccuming with this piece of eqipment. The suction power is great and it has 3 levels it is very portable and has three attachments it also has a very long lasting batteryAfter testing out several different models, I can confidently say that this is the best option on the market even better than dyson. This vacuum is incredibly powerful and effective, easily picking up dirt and debris from both carpets and hard floors.What sets this vaccume apart from other vacuums is its Lift-Away feature, which allows you to detach the canister from the base and clean hard-to-reach areas like stairs and upholstery with ease. The vacuum also comes with a variety of attachments, including a crevice tool and pet power brush, making it a great choice for homes with pets.Another great feature of the voweek is its HEPA filtration system, which captures lots of dust and allergens in your home. This is especially important for people with allergies or respiratory issues.Overall, I highly recommend the voweek Vacuum for anyone in need of a powerful, versatile, and effective cleaning tool for their home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars House with pups approved
reviews.reviewText: Pros:Good suction but gentle enough to not swallow up my area rugs. I have three indoor dogs and this does great collecting a lot of the hair and dust on a day-to-day before I deep clean on the weekend. Easy assemble, maneuvering, and empty out.CONS:Battery runs out quickly if one one of the higher suction levels. Vacuum can't stand on it's own, needs to lean (isn't very stable on it's own - flops over).So far I love it and use it daily to clean my rugs, vinyl flooring and couch. I just plug it in overnight so that it has a full battery when I need to use it and won't un out mid- vacuum.It does a wonderful job with cleaning up after my fur-babies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Stick vacuum for price
reviews.reviewText: This vacuum is a dream, great suction, lightweight, rechargeable battery is detachable for easy charging. This item is quiet too, quality item and works that was as well.I had purchased a cheaper stick vacuum and received a cheap product that is

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works good, but battery life not great.
reviews.reviewText: My house is 1370sq ft. This goes from 100% battery to 45% battery by the time I do 1/2 of the house, which is 50/50 carpet & hardwood. Once the battery hits about 40%, suction/performance is greatly reduced. If your home is larger, or you have more carpet, you're NOT going to like this unit. I'm on the fence over returning it. I can't wholeheartedly recommend it. Voweek should have included a second battery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I can’t complain it comes with a light so you can actually see where you’re vacuuming. maneuvers and goes onto and under most places. It comes with two extra attachments to make it easy to clean. The suction is very good and does the job. The battery does not run out on me while vacuuming my 3 bedroom apt. I’d recommend this, and for the price point, it is excellent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow-this is even better than I'd Hoped. Great for tall people with back problems.
reviews.reviewText: Whomever designed this vacuum took every clever design feature possible and utilized them perfectly in one vacuum. I used to hate vacuuming because our older Dyson is a heavy beast, corded and makes a horrible shrieking sound when placed in the upright position before being fully turned off. It works fine on carpets, but is nearly worthless on hardwood floors-didn't know that before we purchased it. We now live in a place that is 100% hardwood floors, so the Shrieking Behemoth isn't cutting it.I'm on the taller side, and unfortunately the majority of cleaning equipment (unless it's designed for professional janitors) is usually too short for me, resulting in me stooping and crouching while trying to clean, and then my back aching afterwards. This vacuum is *just right* with an extendable neck that is tall enough for me not to hunch while vacuuming. I am completely delighted. It has three modes of suction power, with a helpful little digital display that tells you how much of the battery power remains as you go.I can clean our stairs! I can reach under the center of our bed and get at the dust there without getting on my hands and knees! The overall weight of the vacuum is so light, that I can cover the majority of our floors very quickly. A miracle has occurred and now I actually enjoy vacuuming. The head on the extendable tube swivels at two joints, making it really easy to maneuver while in use-you rarely (if ever) have to pick it up to adjust it while vacuuming. Wow.The trigger style switch also makes it very easy to stop the vacuum instantly if you accidentally vacuum rubber bands, twist ties, or the usual things that can destroy a vacuum and strain the motor into oblivion.The canister is small, but ingeniously there is a built in hair guard on the central vacuum core-no more performing surgery on the vacuum just to get it ready to use. Easy to empty, easy to take care of. I have long hair and I cannot tell you how often I've had to perform surgery on the Shrieking Behemoth to get it usable and to shriek more quietly.The head of this vacuum is very easy to disassemble to remove long hairs from the floor brushes, then reassemble, perfectly designed.The only CON is that the vacuum's battery takes hours to recharge. I mean at least 3 hours. Being a disorganized human, I just plug it in after use and let it fully recharge before putting it away, keeping it ready to be used at a moment's notice.Get this vacuum. Your back will thank you, your housemates will thank you, and your pets will thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Had this product for about six months now and i’m very impressed. It was so cost effective and it really works. I haven’t had any issues with it. I have hardwood flooring and a few carpets in my apartment and it does great on both. It dissembles easily to clean. I’ve cleaned the filter twice now and it’s super easy. It’s also pretty quiet. It’s flexible and smooth. Definitely would recommend.
